title: Blood Moon 2017

embed.description: See this Instagram photo by @leagueoflegends * 3,041 likes

body: Normally we get 2 Blood Moon skins a year, right? It's kind of obvious that one of them this year is Jhin{{champion:202}} . That raises the question, who is the other one to get a skin?

replies.body:
Well, the first skin is obviously Jhin.

IMO, the second skin will be for Irelia. The arch surrounding his gun looks Ionian and it just reminds me of Irelia, because of how it looks like the gateway to a temple and floats in the air.

Or maybe it could just be another garen or riven skin because we definitely need more of those.
Blood moon Azir. You summon one of the gates as a turret xD
Arch in there. Arch in yi spalsh. must be yi. (sarcastic undertones)

The mist around the poles too kinda reminds me of {{champion:83}}

Edit: Looks kinda person shaped with a hand on the right pole
It would be unfair if Irelia didn't get a Bloodmoon skin.
